review: While I live overseas and have limited access to many of the useful apps on Chromecast, such as Netflix etc., I have been delighted at how easy it was to setup and work on turning my old non-smart tv into one capable of at least displaying Youtube streams.

review: This couldn't be easier to install.  It does exactly what it says it will do. Stop watching on you computer and move to your TV.

review: I watch way too much stuff on this. More apps in the future too. I used to watch Netflix on my PS3, but this is so compact and a smaller footprint that I use it all the time.

review: If you are looking for a device that allows you to mirror your laptop, smart phone, etc. to a non smart TV then this will work for you. The browser isn't the best, the interaction is limited, and the software is very restrictive. If you want to make you TV a smart TV then I'd recommend looking for something akin to a Roku. save your money.
author: A. Davis "Amazon Warrior"
